description_for_human: A simple service to manage repair tickets for devices so that Microsoft 365 Copilot agents can list, inspect, and create repairs on behalf of users.
description_for_model: A simple service to manage repair tickets for devices so that Microsoft 365 Copilot agents can list, inspect, and create repairs on behalf of users.

functions.name: createRepair
functions.description: Create a new repair ticket for a device that needs to be fixed.

functions.name: listRepairs
functions.description: Always use this function whenever the user asks for the CURRENT list of repair tickets or wants to filter repairs by status or assignee. This function retrieves the up-to-date list of repairs from the backend system; do not assume the list from previous messages is complete.
